video.title: The Secret World of Santa
video.synopsis: This animated series follows the adventures of Santa Claus and his elves as they prepare for Christmas and fend off the evil troll Gruzzlebeard.

episodes.synopsis: When Gruzzlebeard breaks the toy machine, Santa and the elves embark on a dangerous journey to replace the magic pearl that powers the machine.
episodes.title: The Magic Pearl

episodes.synopsis: Every 100 years, Santa has to pass a 12-part test to keep his job, but this time, Gruzzlebeard is determined to use all his tricks to make Santa fail.
episodes.title: The Twelve Labors of Santa Claus

episodes.synopsis: A pair of twin brothers hacks into "Santanet" and changes the list of children due for presents, prompting an investigation by Santa and the elves.
episodes.title: Little Geniuses

episodes.synopsis: A little boy asks for a reindeer for Christmas and Rudolph, mistakenly believing that Santa wants to replace him, runs away to fulfill the boy's wish.
episodes.title: Rudolph Is Missing

episodes.synopsis: Santa's ability to deliver any present to any location is challenged when a little astronaut spending the holiday in a space station asks for a pony.
episodes.title: The Star Child

episodes.synopsis: When the children of Cityville boycott Santa, the elves learn that a youngster who didn't get his Christmas wish years earlier is leading the revolt.
episodes.title: Leon's Christmas

episodes.synopsis: The richest boy in the world is bored and doesn't need toys, so Santa and the elves devise a unique way for him to get into the spirit of giving.
episodes.title: A Present for Two

episodes.synopsis: When stuffed bunny Jumper is tossed out, Santa comes to the rescue and creates a video game for Jumper to star in and win back a little boy's heart.
episodes.title: Super Rabbit

episodes.synopsis: Santa helps a figure skater find confidence in her abilities while the elves try to stop Gruzzlebeard and Dudley from cheating at a competition.
episodes.title: The Lucky Charm

episodes.synopsis: Bandits kidnap the elves and hold them for ransom when they travel to Almeria to help an archaeologist recover an artifact and get home for Christmas.
episodes.title: The Flying Carpet

episodes.synopsis: When Santa is interviewed by a famous reporter, he recalls meeting Merlin and arranging to give a young boy named Arthur the magical sword Excalibur.
episodes.title: Santa Claus's Memoirs

episodes.synopsis: Gruzzlebeard interferes when a little girl asks for a magic wand, and it's up to Santa and the elves to reverse the effects of the defective magic.
episodes.title: The Magic Wand

episodes.synopsis: David is jealous of his baby sister and wishes to be little again, so Dudley steals Santa's size-changing machine, with predictably awful results.
episodes.title: The Boy Who Wished to Be Little Again

episodes.synopsis: The children of the nearby village want to give Santa a special present, and their chance comes when Gruzzlebeard ruins Santa's favorite suit.
episodes.title: A Present for Santa

episodes.synopsis: Santa invites his magical friends for a conference at the North Pole, and Gruzzlebeard causes chaos by kidnapping and impersonating one of the guests.
episodes.title: The Christmas Conference

episodes.synopsis: To fulfill a Christmas wish, the elves make an elaborate book about their history, but Gruzzlebeard creates a laser beam to hijack the 3D technology.
episodes.title: The Story of the Trolls

episodes.synopsis: Gruzzlebeard's sidekick, Dudley, asks the elves for a robot to replace him while he goes on vacation, and fake Dudley creates chaos in the village.
episodes.title: Christmas for Dudley

episodes.synopsis: When Santa and the elves travel to the year 2222, they uncover a disturbing lack of Christmas spirit and engineer a way to make the future brighter.
episodes.title: The Return of Santa Claus

episodes.synopsis: The elves disobey Santa's orders by giving a girl a potion to grow tall enough to play basketball, but their incorrect dosage turns her into a giant.
episodes.title: The Tall Little Girl

episodes.synopsis: Balbo tries to give himself to a boy who wants a life-sized teddy bear, and the elves, regretting that they had teased Balbo, search for their friend.
episodes.title: The Teddy Bear

episodes.synopsis: An angry boy who never got a present goes on a crime spree, impersonating Santa and robbing toy stores. It's up to the real Santa to unmask him.
episodes.title: Stolen Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Gruzzlebeard uses magic to bring all the toys in the workshop to life, and Santa must chase after them when they decide to explore the outside world.
episodes.title: Havoc in Toyland

episodes.synopsis: A little boy stranded on an island with his parents asks for Santa's help fighting an evil troll witch, and Santa comes up with an unusual solution.
episodes.title: Message in a Bottle

episodes.synopsis: Indecisive young Balthazar can't make up his mind what he wants, much to frustration of Santa, who is determined to help him choose the perfect gift.
episodes.title: Balthazar Can't Make Up His Mind

episodes.synopsis: When Santa reveals his secret method of stopping time to deliver gifts, Gruzzlebeard interferes with the device, sending Santa to prehistoric times.
episodes.title: The Longest Night

episodes.synopsis: Having returned to the present, Santa and the elves continue the gift deliveries, and have three houses left when Gruzzlebeard smashes Santa's clock.
episodes.title: Santa Claus' Secret
